text:
Courtesy of M.A.C

Nicki Minaj and beauty fans rejoice—the rapper has teamed up with M.A.C on new range of limited-edition, nude lipsticks set to drop this September. The collaboration features two shades, “Nicki’s Nude” (which is described as a soft coral pink), and “The Pinkprint” ( a mid-toned pink named after her 2014 album), both in neutral-colored packaging adorned with the rapper’s signature.

This isn’t the first time Minaj has lent her style to M.A.C—the brand first created a limited edition lipstick in her name in 2010, and she has since appeared in multiple M.A.C Viva Glam campaigns to benefit HIV/AIDS awareness.

But fans have even more to be excited for: This morning, Minaj announced via Instagram that her newest MAC editions were just the start of something bigger. “I'll release these #NickiNudes in September, in preparation for my big surprise announcement with M•A•C.” Does this mean a full collection of makeup inspired by Nicki will be available? And if so, are the nude shades a hint at what’s to come? Time will tell, but until then, start plotting how you’ll get your hands on the Nicki Nudes.

The MAC x Nicki Minaj lipsticks retail for $17.50, and will be available in stores and online September 21 through October 19.
title: M.A.C Cosmetics x Nicki Minaj

og.description: Two nude shades and a big surprise in the works
